mapper.select: SELECT F.FRN_NAME, F.FRN_X, F.FRN_Y, F.FRN_START_TIME, F.FRN_END_TIME, F.FRN_TEL, F.FRN_NO, F.FRN_STREET, F.FRN_DETAIL , S.SAL_PRICE , S2.STOCK_CT_NAME , S1.STOCK_NO, S1.STOCK_NAME , I.IS_COUNT FROM FRANCHISE_T F LEFT OUTER JOIN SALES_T S ON F.FRN_NO = S.FRN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN INVENTORY_STAT_T I ON S.FRN_NO = I.FRN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN STOCK_T S1 ON I.STOCK_NO = S1.STOCK_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN STOCK_CATEGORY_T S2 ON S2.STOCK_CT_NO = S1.STOCK_CT_NO WHERE 1=1
